name: Abra
flavorText:
Using its ability
to read minds, it
will identify impending danger
and TELEPORT to
safety.

previous.name: Poliwrath
previous.flavorText:
An adept swimmer
at both the front
crawl and breast stroke. Easily
overtakes the best
human swimmers.

next.name: Kadabra
next.flavorText:
It emits special
alpha waves from
its body that induce headaches
just by being
close by.

pokemon.name: Alakazam

Its brain can out­
perform a super­
computer. Its intelligence
quotient is said
to be 5,000.
